setMainRole.success: Your main role has been set to **{role}**.
setMainRole.failure: Failed to set your main role. {error}
setMainRole.invalidRole: Invalid role. Please specify one of `TOP`, `JG`, `MID`, `BOT`, `SUP`.

create.success: Created a custom game event. Posting a recruitment message.

error.invalidDateTimeFormat: Invalid date or time format. Please use MM/DD HH:mm format.

info.dateTooFarWarning: ⚠️ Warning: The start date is more than a month away.

error.generic: There was an error canceling the event.
error.interaction: An error occurred while canceling the event. Please try again later.

info.noActiveEvents: You have no active events to cancel.

error.unknown:
❌ Unknown Error.
An error occurred while setting up roles.

success.createdRoles:
Thank you for inviting me to your server, "{guildName}"!
I have automatically created the necessary roles ({count}): {roles}
success.noAction:
Thank you for inviting me to your server, "{guildName}"!
All necessary roles already existed, so I didn't need to create any.

error.permission: I was invited to "{guildName}", but I don't have the "Manage Roles" permission. Please check the server settings.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred while setting up roles in "{guildName}".

error.command: There was an error while executing this command!

info.guildOnlyCommand: This command can only be used in a server.

error.failure: Failed to check the bot's health. {error}
